text: how many one is Helen here today I will

help people deal with hot temperature

doses if you like it also has really

carefully because we're gonna cook it

then cut in half again in horizontally
and then remove the seeds with a spoon
make sure that you remove all the soft
part around assist completely because
that part gonna make the drink sour

to add one and a half liters of water

you can also use normal sugar of course
and bring to a boil until the sugar

press the winter melons through a sieve
